title: Junk Boy

synonyms: The Incredible Gyoukai Video Junk Boy

synopsis:
Ryouhei Yamazaki is a young man hoping to score a position working for Poteto Boy, the hottest gentleman's magazine around. When he becomes visibly aroused during the job interview, though, he thinks all is lost until the beautiful head editor, Yuki Oda, tells him to come back the next morning. As a writer in touch with the magazine's core demographic, Ryouhei offers his unique perspectives on different photoshoots. Excited as he may be, Ryouhei has much to learn if he wants to succeed both as a journalist and a mature lover.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
